text: Too often we... enjoy the comfort of opinion without the discomfort of thought
author: John F. Kennedy

text: Friendship is Love without his wings!
author: Lord Byron

text: The love that lasts longest is the love that is never returned
author: W. Somerset Maugham

text: You begin with the possibilities of the material
author: Robert Rauschenberg

text: Love the giver more than the gift
author: Brigham Young

text: Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same
author: Emily Bronte

text: The only way to discover the limits of the possible is to go beyond them into the impossible
author: Arthur C. Clarke

text: I've been on so many blind dates, I should get a free dog.
author: Wendy Liebman
